Bases: WebSocketServerFactory

Factory for WebSocket Servers

broadcast(message, sender)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method broadcasts the message to all clients in the chat

Parameters:

  • message ‚Äì The message to broadcast

  • sender ‚Äì Sender client of the message

getUsernameAndLang()[source]ÔÉÅ

This methods compiles a list of all usernames and languages participating in the chat

Return client_list:

List of clients and their set language

register(client)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method adds a client to the list of chat participants

Parameters:

client ‚Äì client to be registered

sendCurrentUsers()[source]ÔÉÅ

This method sends a list of all clients currently registered to the server

unregister(client)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method removes the client from the list of chat participants

Parameters:

client ‚Äì client to be removed

onClose(wasClean, code, reason)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method is called when the websocket connection closes

Parameters:

  • wasClean ‚Äì boolean whether the connection was closed cleanly

  • code ‚Äì status code of the connection close

  • reason ‚Äì cause for connection close

onConnect(request)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method connects a client to the server

Parameters:

request ‚Äì incoming request from the client

onMessage(payload, isBinary)[source]ÔÉÅ

This method receives a message from a client, calls translation, sentiment analysis, chatbot and distributes it among the chat participants

Parameters:

  • payload ‚Äì incoming message from the client

  • isBinary ‚Äì Boolean indicating whether a message is binary or not

Raises:

HTTPStatus ‚Äì 400 Bad Request if the incoming message is malformed

onOpen()[source]ÔÉÅ

This method registers a new client when the connection is openned
